==Japanese==
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{wikipedia|Jasmine}}
[[File:Jasmine Bud in Chennai during Spring.JPG|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|茉莉}} (''matsuri''): a budding '''[[jasmine]]''' plant, ''Jasminum sambac''.]]

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|まつ|り}}
From {{der|ja|sa|sort=まつり|मालती}} or {{m|sa|मल्लिका}}, via {{der|ja|ltc|sort=まつり|茉莉|tr={{IPAchar|/mat lei/}}}}.

{{ja-pron|yomi=o|まつり|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|まつり|マツリ}}

# the [[jasmine]] [[plant]]
# {{qualifier|more generally}} a [[plant]] of the [[genus]] ''[[Jasminum]]''

* {{ja-r|茉莉油|まつりゆ}}: [[jasmine]] [[oil]]
